extendedInfo.description: Download missing album art for your albums.â One click downloads all your missing album artâ Data from LastFM & MusicBrainzâ Manual cover load from Galleryâ Auto-save to SDCardâ Auto-lookup album art when new album is addedâ Custom search by artist or albumâ Built in media scannerFORUMVisit the forum for all questions and answers related to Album Art Grabber.http://album-art-grabber.2309410.n4.nabble.com/PRO VERSIONSupport development with the ad free pro version of Album Art Grabber :)PERMISSIONS'Internet' for fetching covers and ads.'Access Network State' for ads.'Wake Lock' for 'Auto-lookup for New' preference.'Write External Storage' for saving album art to SDCard.'Receive Boot Completed' for 'Auto-lookup for New' preference (will not be used unless preference is checked).INFORMATIONâ¢ To update your album list use the Media Scanner under preferences.â¢ If album art is not found it can be because the tags for your mp3s are inaccurate.â¢ Album Art Grabber has two modes of finding covers. The default mode and the strict matching mode. If you are getting the wrong album covers set then turn on 'Strict Matching' under preferences.â¢ Album Art Grabber works with ICS, though not with Google Music as they do not use Android's music database.

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: love this app gets 99% of my covers the rest you can upload your own image brilliant if you like a organized music collection defo get!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work as advertised.
reviews.comment: Easy to use and works great. You do need to clear the cache in your preferred music app thought. Once I figured that out, it worked like a charm. No more blank cover art in my music library.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
reviews.comment: I was getting so frustrated over how my Nexus 10 would just randomly assign photos I\'ve downloaded to music that I\'ve downloaded that I even called Google support to inquire as to how to change the album artwork, to which I was told I had to do it on a computer and install some program blah blah blah.. Thank God I found this app, it is awesome and works absolutely wonderfully! Now I just need an app to edit artist/album/track info directly on the Nexus 10.
reviews.author: Micha\303\253l Mertz

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app works smoothly and quickly, no glitches or force closing! I just wish we can pick album art for individual songs. Other than that, this app is close to perfection
reviews.author: Jossary Padilla

reviews.title: Brilliant and easy
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, my music collection has been cleaned up with the push of one button, brilliant, well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Fantastic app fast and precise and with the manual search option you can easily find the artwork it misses which are very few will be upgrading to the pro version to thank the developer for all the time this tiny app has saved me big thumbs up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesomeness!!
reviews.comment: This app is fantastic! It grabbed the art I was missing quickly and accurately. The few I had to do manually were simple clicks. I now have artwork for all my music. Great job! Samsung Galaxy S II
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: !!!!BEST!!!!!
reviews.comment: Simply the easiest/ quickest/ most efficient app for grabbing AND APPLYING your album art!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: What a great app. It\'s was so annoying having no album art on a lot of my music.  I like old classic rock and the album art is just as important as the songs. It even gives you some choices for one cover,  sometimes it is handy if you got a deluxe version.
reviews.author: Rhodri Tewkesbury

reviews.title: Does what it says, Easily!
reviews.comment: Upgaded from the original SG to the SGIII. For some reason, it seems the SGIII doesn\'t run media scanner like the old one did.  Album cover art wouldn\'t transfer anymore when copy/paste music from cp to the phones sd card.  This program does the trick!  Easy to use, fast. Awesome!!
reviews.author: Ed Somerville Jr

reviews.title: DOES WORK WITH GOOGLE MUSIC APP & GOOGLE PLAY.
reviews.comment: This is the must have app if you can\'t get your music cover art to appear. It fully works with both the built in Music app & the Google Play Music app. After using Album Art Grabber, you just have to select your preferred music app from the \"manage apps\" on your phones main menu and clear the data then run the music app and it will read your music library and every cover art will be applied! Great app! I highly recommend this app to anyone who can\'t get their music album art to work initially.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 2.5 stars.
reviews.comment: It only shows about 50% of my library?! I need ALL the music. And every few weeks the album art dissapears? Please fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Album Artwork Grabber
reviews.comment: Well, it says what it does on the tin and does it well. I would like it if you could edit your albums so you can have each individual song with the right artwork. Impart from that great app!
reviews.author: Hannah Maxey

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.comment: Really simple to use with good results. It can be used with Google play music; run the app then go to settings, apps, all, Google play music. Then delete app data, then restart Google music and it will rescan for tracks on the device with the new art included
reviews.author: Tom Norford

reviews.title: CRAP APP
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t even open. Tries, then just stops and goes to previous screen. UNINSTALLED. Only reason it got 1 star is that it won\'t let me rate at \342\210\205 stars.
reviews.author: scott abbott

reviews.title: Real Smooth
reviews.comment: Easy to use app, no fuss at all. Gives your music wonderful covers. To improve there should be a wider variety of covers. Overall, it\'s a wonderful app.
reviews.author: Christina Tran

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: One of the best apps on the store and a good app to have for those who download music files, does what it says it does and happy with that, thanks developer(s)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly on the Galaxy Nexus ICS
reviews.comment: After grabbing all album arts, go to settings>Apps>All>Google Play Music and hit the Clear Data button.  Then launch the Google Play Music app and the album arts will show up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Excellent app,  does what it says,  made my music collection perfect with all album covers from pink Floyd to Shakira,  the who to Sean Paul... All there.  Best free app on the market!!!!!  Highly recommend
reviews.author: Amanda Elizabeth

reviews.title: I\'m paying for this one!
reviews.comment: Awesome, actually works! Been looking for something like this for a while. Alot of my art, even from hard copy albums I have bought are mysteriously missing from my phone, especially from google play music (although I like rocket player best). Sweet app! The ads are no problem, this app is  just worth supporting.
reviews.author: Neil McEachin
